video.summary:

video.title: Radiation levels at Fukushima now 650sv/h. Fukushima Exposed
video.summary:
Tepco has announced that radiation levels inside the reactor were estimated at up to 650 sieverts per hour, much higher than the record 530 sieverts per hour marked by the previous survey.
